title: 165. From Paris With Love: Abigail Adams Travels Abroad
itunes:title: 165. From Paris With Love: Abigail Adams Travels Abroad
itunes:subtitle: Today, on Sharon Says So, we revisit a favorite first lady, Abigail Adams. Follow along as Abigail travels across the Atlantic, adventuring in Paris and France with her husband, John Adams.
description:
Today, on Sharon Says So, we revisit a favorite first lady, Abigail Adams. Follow along as Abigail travels across the Atlantic, adventuring in Paris and France with her husband, John Adams. The power couple ultimately lands back in Boston only to move again into new roles, as President and First Lady of the United States.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
